text: Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho
edit: Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho

translations.transtext: Which birth in each class of those beings, [that is] the origin [of life], [as well as] coming into being, coming forth, becoming, appearance of the [five] aggregates, [and] obtaining of the six sense bases.
